com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.jmx.mbeans

Interface LoggerMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Logger

    public interface LoggerMXBean
    The logger MXBean interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getlocalDirectory()
      Accessor for the local destination directory for replication files.
      LoggerMetadata getmetadata()
      Accessor for the logger meta data.
      String getmountFailureReason()
      Accessor for the mount failure reason.

      Accessor for the logger operation state.

      Accessor to the boolean that specifies whether the remote data snapshot at startup has been replicated locally.

      Accessor for the replication snapshot.

      Accessor for the logger type.

      Mount the local logger.
      void shutdownAndDeleteLogger()
      Unmount the logger if it is mounted and then delete all local replicated logs and the logger directory.
      void unmount()
      Unmount the local logger.

    • Method Detail

      • getremoteStartupDataReplicated

        boolean getremoteStartupDataReplicated()
        Accessor to the boolean that specifies whether the remote data snapshot at startup has been replicated locally.
        Returns:
        True if initial data replication has occurred false otherwise.

      • getoperationalState

        LoggerOperationalState getoperationalState()
        Accessor for the logger operation state.
        Returns:
        The operation state.

      • getmetadata

        LoggerMetadata getmetadata()
        Accessor for the logger meta data.
        Returns:
        The logger meta data.

      • mount

        void mount()
    throws IOException
        Mount the local logger.

        Persists the local logger in local storage and starts replication from the remote logger if the remote logger has come online.

        Throws:
        IOException - An IO exception occurred storing the mount value.

      • unmount

        void unmount()
      throws IOException
        Unmount the local logger.

        Stops replication from the remote logger.

        Throws:
        IOException - An IO exception occurred storing the unmount value.

      • getlocalDirectory

        String getlocalDirectory()
        Accessor for the local destination directory for replication files.

        Returns:
        The local directory as a string.

      • getmountFailureReason

        String getmountFailureReason()
        Accessor for the mount failure reason.
        Returns:
        The mount failure reason string.

      • gettype

        String gettype()
        Accessor for the logger type.
        Returns:
        The logger type string.

      • getreplicationSnapshot

        LoggerReplicationSnapshot getreplicationSnapshot()
                                          throws IOException
        Accessor for the replication snapshot.
        Returns:
        The logger replication snapshot.
        Throws:
        IOException - AN IO exception occurred retrieving the replication snapshot.

      • shutdownAndDeleteLogger

        void shutdownAndDeleteLogger()
                      throws IOException
        Unmount the logger if it is mounted and then delete all local replicated logs and the logger directory. After this operation no other logger operation should be invoked. It is expected this operation is invoked once the server instance in the MIS has been removed.
        Throws:
        IOException - An IOException has been raised while trying to shutdown and delete the logger.
